description:
Here's basically how Austin Wilde spent last Tuesday: he started jerking off in a men's room until somebody finally came along to take a piss. That someone just so happened to be Joey Baltimore. And lucky for Austin, too. See Joey Baltimore is the kind of guy who goes to take a piss in hopes that someone might be jacking off in the stall. So when Austin feeds his dick through the glory hole, fishing for a taker, you might say right place right time, or a match made in... well, a men's room.

Enjoy!
title: Wilde Glory
